snippet: The Detroit Pistons and Charlotte Hornets are on the board, not waiting until the NBA's trade deadline on Thursday to make moves they hope will bolster their playoffs chances this season....
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons and Charlotte Hornets are on the board, not waiting until the NBA's trade deadline on Thursday to make moves they hope will bolster their playoffs chances this season.

headline.main: Tick Tock: The Clock Is Winding Down to NBA's Trade Deadline
headline.print_headline: Tick Tock: The Clock Is Winding Down to NBA's Trade Deadline
